pageContent: Objectives: Focal salvage HIFU is a feasible therapeutic option in some men who have recurrence after primary radiotherapy for prostate cancer. We aimed to determine if multi-parametric quantitative parameters, in addition to clinical factors, might have a role in independently predicting focal salvage HIFU outcomes.

metaData.source:
Higher second fourth digit ratio predicts higher incidence of prostate cancer in prostate biopsy
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/23154605/
